Report Abuse. Semantics (from Greek σημαντικός - semantikos[1][2]) is the study of meaning, usually in language. The word semantics itself denotes a range of ideas, from the popular to the highly technical. It is often used in ordinary language to denote a problem of understanding that comes down to word selection or connotation.
